workflow.name: Upwork job aggregator with OpenAI summaries & multi-channel notifications
workflow.description:
Automated system that aggregates job postings from Upwork based on your criteria and delivers personalized notifications, helping you never miss relevant opportunities.

## üöÄ What It Does

- Custom job search based on keywords, skills, and categories
- Real-time job posting monitoring
- Smart filtering and prioritization
- Multi-channel notifications (Email/Slack/Teams)
- Duplicate detection

## üéØ Perfect For

- Freelancers seeking new opportunities
- Agencies looking for projects
- Recruiters sourcing talent
- Business owners finding contractors
- Digital nomads

## ‚öôÔ∏è Key Benefits

‚úÖ Save hours of manual searching  
‚úÖ Get notified about relevant jobs first  
‚úÖ Never miss perfect opportunities  
‚úÖ Customizable search criteria  
‚úÖ Time-zone friendly notifications  

## üîß What You Need

- Upwork account
- n8n instance
- Preferred notification channels setup

## üìä Features

- Custom keyword alerts
- Budget range filtering
- Client history analysis
- Job type filtering (hourly/fixed)
- Experience level filtering

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup & Support

### Quick Setup

Be up and running in 15 minutes with our step-by-step guide

### üì∫ Watch Tutorial

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/badge/YouTube-Watch_Tutorial-red?style=for-the-badge&logo=youtube)](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)

### üíº Get Expert Support

[![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-Connect-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=linkedin)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)

### üìß Direct Help

[![Email](https://img.shields.io/badge/Email-Contact%20Us-green?style=for-the-badge&logo=gmail)](mailto:Yaron@nofluff.online)

Transform your freelance career with automated job hunting. Spend less time searching and more time winning projects.

parameters.content:
### üîÅ **Section 1: Job Fetch & Preparation**

üì¶ **Group Name**: `üì• Fetch & Prepare Upwork Jobs`

#### ‚úÖ **Included Nodes:**

1. `üïí Daily Upwork Job Trigger`
2. `üåê Fetch Upwork Jobs (Apify)`
3. `üõ†Ô∏è Format Job Fields`

#### üìã **What this group does:**

This group is responsible for automatically triggering the job search, pulling fresh job data from Upwork (via Apify), and formatting that data into a clean, structured format.

#### üìå **Highlights:**

* Uses Apify‚Äôs `run-sync-get-dataset-items` to ensure you get fresh job results in one go.
* Ensures only the required fields (like title, URL, budget) are passed forward.
* Keeps your data clean and minimal for logging and summarization.

---

### üìä **Section 2: Data Logging & Summary Generation**

üì¶ **Group Name**: `üßæ Log & Summarize Jobs`

#### ‚úÖ **Included Nodes:**

1. `üìà Log Jobs to Google Sheet`
2. `ü§ñ Summarize Job Listings`

   * `üß† OpenAI Job Summarizer`
   * `üìÑ Parse Summary Output`

#### üìã **What this group does:**

This group handles the dual responsibility of:

* Persistently logging all job entries to a **Google Sheet**
* Generating a human-friendly **natural language summary** of the fetched jobs using the OpenAI model and parsing the result into clean output

#### üí° **Why this matters:**

* Keeps historical records in Sheets ‚úÖ
* Makes email digest more meaningful and less overwhelming for the reader üß†

---

## üì§ **Section 3: Job Summary Notification**

üì¶ **Group Name**: `‚úâÔ∏è Notify via Email`

#### ‚úÖ **Included Node:**

1. `üìß Send Job Summary Email`

#### üìã **What this group does:**

Sends a **summary email** to the desired recipient(s) with the content generated by the AI agent.

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# ‚úÖ n8n Automation: "Upwork Job Aggregator & Notifier"

> **Purpose**: Automatically fetch job postings from Upwork with specific keywords, save them in Google Sheets, summarize them using AI, and email the results daily (or at any interval you want).

---

## üß± HIGH-LEVEL OVERVIEW

| Feature         | Description                                          |
| --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| üïê Trigger      | Scheduled (e.g., every 6 hours)                      |
| üåê Source       | [Apify](https://apify.com) actor for Upwork scraping |
| üìÑ Storage      | Google Sheets                                        |
| üß† Summary      | OpenAI model with structured output                  |
| üì¨ Notification | Gmail with formatted job summary                     |

---

## üß† GROUP 1: üì• Fetch & Prepare Upwork Jobs

### üü¢ Nodes:

1. `üïí Daily Upwork Job Trigger`

   * **Type**: Cron Trigger
   * **Purpose**: Runs the flow automatically at your set interval (e.g., every 6 hours or daily)

2. `üåê Fetch Upwork Jobs (Apify)`

   * **Type**: HTTP Request
   * **Method**: POST
   * **URL**: `https://api.apify.com/v2/actor-tasks/<TASK_ID>/run-sync-get-dataset-items?token=<API_TOKEN>`
   * **Purpose**: Calls your Apify Upwork Scraper task to get the latest job listings
   * **Output**: JSON array of job objects

3. `üõ†Ô∏è Format Job Fields`

   * **Type**: Edit Fields (Set or Function Node)
   * **Purpose**: Extracts needed job fields like `title`, `url`, `description`, `budget`, and `datePosted`
   * **Reason**: Makes data uniform for Sheet storage and AI summary

---

## üìä GROUP 2: üßæ Log & Summarize Jobs

### üü¢ Nodes:

4. `üìà Log Jobs to Google Sheet`

   * **Type**: Google Sheets ‚Üí Append Sheet
   * **Sheet Setup**: Must have headers like `Title`, `URL`, `Description`, `Budget`, `Date`
   * **Purpose**: Appends each new job as a row in the sheet for historical tracking

5. `ü§ñ Summarize Job Listings` (AI Agent node group)

   * **Type**: Tools Agent (LangChain / OpenAI Integration)
   * **Connected Sub-Nodes**:

     * `üß† OpenAI Job Summarizer` (OpenAI Chat Model)

       * **Prompt** example:

         ```
         You are an assistant summarizing freelance job postings. Summarize each job in 1-2 lines. Include title, budget, and a short description.
         ```
     * `üìÑ Parse Summary Output` (Structured Output Parser)

       * **Purpose**: Converts the AI response into structured n8n items
   * **Input**: Job data from Google Sheets
   * **Output**: A clear, natural language summary of all jobs

---

## üì§ GROUP 3: ‚úâÔ∏è Notify via Email

### üü¢ Node:

6. `üìß Send Job Summary Email`

   * **Type**: Gmail ‚Üí Send Message

   * **Authentication**: Google OAuth2

   * **To**: Yourself or your team

   * **Subject**: `"üöÄ New Upwork Jobs Found!"`

   * **Body**:

     ```
     Hello,

     Here‚Äôs a summary of the latest Upwork jobs matching your criteria:

     {{summary from AI}}

     ‚ûï View full job list here: [Google Sheet Link]

     Best,  
     Your Automation Bot ü§ñ
     ```

   * **Error Handling**: Add an IF node to prevent email if no jobs were returned (optional)

---

## üóÇ Suggested Color-Coded Groups in n8n:

| Group                          | Nodes                                | Color     | Description                     |
| ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------- |
| üì• Fetch & Prepare Upwork Jobs | Trigger, HTTP Request, Format Fields | üü¢ Green  | Gets data and prepares it       |
| üßæ Log & Summarize Jobs        | Google Sheets, AI Agent, Parser      | üü° Yellow | Logs + creates smart summaries  |
| ‚úâÔ∏è Notify via Email            | Gmail                                | üî¥ Red    | Notifies you with clean summary |

---

## üöÄ ADVANTAGES

‚úÖ Completely automated
‚úÖ Saves all job history
‚úÖ AI-enhanced summaries
‚úÖ Instant email alerts
‚úÖ Easy to expand or customize

---

## üß© Bonus Enhancements (Optional)

| Idea                      | Description                                                   |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| üîç Add keyword filters    | Add filters before saving to Sheets (e.g., only ‚ÄúReact‚Äù jobs) |
| üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Prevent duplicates | Store job IDs and check before saving                         |
| üì£ Add Slack alerts       | Add Slack node for team notification                          |
| üìä Dashboard              | Build Google Data Studio report over the Sheet                |

---

json.description: We need SEO-optimized copy for a fintech landing page. Prior experience in finance writing preferred.
